title: SpyGenie Mobile Phone Spy Software - 1 Week Free
description:
Android Spy Phone Software - 1 Month License

You will not find better monitoring software than this. We are one of the very few suppliers who can offer you the chance to spy on live calls, record calls and listen to device surroundings as part of our package

Software Features :

Listen to live calls**
Record calls
Spy on IM chats* (Facebook, Skype, Whatsapp & Viber)
Listen to device surroundings*
View call logs & sms data
Spy on GPS locations
Spy on multimedia

*require android rooting
** android rooting required and target device using a GSM network

Compatibility :

Android devices using versions between 2.3 - 4.3
Single SIM devices only
Android rooting required for some features but not all (see above)
Target device must be connected to the internet via wi-fi or packet data

Installation :

Our software has to be installed on the target device by hand

After purchase you will receive an email with your website portal link, username and password
Log into your portal and follow an install wizard to guide you through installation on the target device
Estimated install time 15 - 20 minutes

After installation you will be able to log into the same portal to view data and control features
